Class DiscountReceipt

  • java.lang.Object
    • GroceryReceipt
      • DiscountReceipt

  • public class DiscountReceipt
extends GroceryReceipt
    Simulates the receipt of discounted items generated by a clerk
    Author:
    Prabhdeep Kainth period 4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscountReceipt(Employee clerk, boolean preferred)
      Initializes the clerk to the passed in employee, the receipt to an empty string, total, internalDiscount to 0 and the preferred flag to the passed in value

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Item i)
      If the receipt is for a preferred customer and the item is discounted, updates the discount count and the discount amount.
      double getDiscountAmount()
      Returns the total discounted amount
      int getDiscountCount()
      Returns the number of discounted items
      double getDiscountPercent()
      Calculates and returns the percent discount
      double getTotal()
      Returns the net price after discount
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string with list of items (one per line), total receipt amount, total discount amount, number of discounted items, percent discount and total amount after discount

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscountReceipt

        public DiscountReceipt(Employee clerk,
                       boolean preferred)
        Initializes the clerk to the passed in employee, the receipt to an empty string, total, internalDiscount to 0 and the preferred flag to the passed in value
        Parameters:
        clerk - - employee gnerating this receipt
        preferred - - true if the receipt is for a preferred customer, false otherwise. Only preferred customers would get a discount.

        Returns the total discounted amount
        Returns:
        total discounted amount

      • add

        public void add(Item i)
        If the receipt is for a preferred customer and the item is discounted, updates the discount count and the discount amount. Then it adds the item to the receipt
        Overrides:
        add in class GroceryReceipt
        Parameters:
        i - - grocery item to be added

      • getTotal

        public double getTotal()
        Returns the net price after discount
        Overrides:
        getTotal in class GroceryReceipt
        Returns:
        net price after discount

      • getDiscountPercent

        public double getDiscountPercent()
        Calculates and returns the percent discount
        Returns:
        discount percent

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string with list of items (one per line), total receipt amount, total discount amount, number of discounted items, percent discount and total amount after discount
        Overrides:
        toString in class GroceryReceipt
        Returns:
        a string of list of items with discounted price information
